name: Roasted Asparagus with Herb Goat Cheese
author: Raquel Teixeira
summary: Roasting veggies always needs revamping every now and then, and I like to experiment by pairing them with different dressings or cheeses. I happened to love goat cheese and had extra on hand. I paired it with asparagus, and they lived happily ever after.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup herbed goat cheese, crumbled
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Arrange asparagus, side-by-side, on a baking sheet
Drizzle olive oil over asparagus; season with salt and pepper
Roast in the preheated oven until cheese is slightly melted and asparagus are tender yet firm to the bite, about 10 minutes
